description.value:
While raging, you gain the following benefits:

  • You ignore any levels of exhaustion you currently suffer for the duration of your rage.

  • You canâ€™t be charmed or frightened while raging. If you are already charmed or frightened when you enter a rage, the effect is suspended for the duration of the rage.

  • During a Frenzy, if you score a critical hit or reduce a creature to 0 HP, you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your [[/healing @prof + @abilities.con.mod temp]]{PB + your CON modifier}. These hit points last until expended or until you finish a short or long rest.
